biog.entry.name: ROBERT, the Hon. Stuart Rowland
biog.entry.description: Biography for ROBERT, the Hon. Stuart Rowland
biog.entry.electorate.name: Member for Fadden (Qld)
biog.entry.title: Biography for ROBERT, the Hon. Stuart Rowland
biog.entry.electorate.state.name: Member for Fadden (Qld)
biog.entry.party.name: Liberal Party of Australia

parliamentary.service.title: Parliamentary Service
parliamentary.service.para: Elected to the House of Representatives for Fadden, Queensland, 2007, 2010 and 2013.

committee.service.title: Committee Service
committee.service.para: Joint Statutory: Corporations and Financial Services from 11.3.08 to 19.7.10; Public Accounts and Audit from 11.3.08 to 3.2.10.
Joint Standing: Foreign Affairs, Defence and Trade from 11.3.08 to 5.8.13.

parliamentary.party.positions.title: Parliamentary Party Positions
parliamentary.party.positions.para: Shadow Parliamentary Secretary for Defence from 8.12.09 to 14.9.10.
Member, Opposition Shadow Ministry from 14.9.10 to 18.9.13. Shadow Minister for Defence, Science, Technology and Personnel from 14.9.10 to 18.9.13.

party.positions.title: Party Positions
party.positions.para: Secretary, Liberal Party Fadden Federal Electorate Council 2005-08.

quals.work.pre.parliament.title: Qualifications and Occupation before entering Federal Parliament

local.gov.service.title: Local Government Service
local.gov.service.para: Member, Gold Coast City Council Finance Board.

publications.title: Publications
publications.para: The trial of Lt Gen Tamura - a question of command responsibility, self-published, 1992.

military.service.title: Military Service
military.service.para: Deployed to Bougainville 1998 with the Peace Monitoring Group.

electorate.title: Electorate
electorate.para: Location: south east Queensland; it includes the suburbs of Alberton, Arundel, Biggera Waters, Coombabah, Coomera, Gaven, Gilberton, Helensvale, Hollywell, Hope Island, Jacobs Well, Labrador, Molendinar, Norwell, Paradise Point, Parkwood, Runaway Bay, Stapylton, Steiglitz, Woongoolba and parts of Ormeau, Oxenford, Pacific Pines, Pimpama and Southport. It also includes South Stradbroke Island.
Industries: tourism, market gardens, sugar cane farming, and light industry including boat building.
State electorates: Fadden includes the Queensland Legislative Assembly electorate of Broadwater, and parts of Albert, Coomera, Gaven and Southport.
